name: places/ChIJuXkl0vVZwokRaFO2e_HyemU
formattedAddress: 410 W 47th St 4th floor, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 410 W 47th St 4th floor, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text:
So many great things to say!
I recently had the pleasure of hosting an event at this amazing workout studio space, and I must say, it exceeded all my expectations!
The studio itself is immaculate, providing a clean and inviting atmosphere that immediately sets the tone for a great fitness experience. The range of workout equipment available is impressive; I was able to find everything I needed to design the perfect workout for my event.
What truly set this studio apart is the exceptional service provided by the owner. From the initial inquiry to the day of the event, the owner was incredibly attentive and accommodating. They ensured that all my requirements were met and went above and beyond to make sure everything ran smoothly.

Will definitely book this studio again!

originalText.text: Studio 16 provides all the equipment and space you need, to help your clients progress and keep crushing their goals. I have had the pleasure of meeting the owner Nate. He has been critical in helping trainers in Manhattan find clients and help them grow within the industry.

text.text: Studio 16 provides all the equipment and space you need, to help your clients progress and keep crushing their goals. I have had the pleasure of meeting the owner Nate. He has been critical in helping trainers in Manhattan find clients and help them grow within the industry.

originalText.text:
I had a very positive experience with Studio 16.

Before I joined, I hadn’t worked out consistently for a few years because of COVID. I chose studio 16 since I only wanted personal training and didn’t want the hidden fees other gyms came with. I was a little nervous because the studio is pretty new and personal training is not cheap, but after the consultation call with Nate I decided to give it a chance. Nate kindly let me try out 2 trainers before making a decision.

I worked with Anthony for 6 months and cannot recommend him enough. Anthony was very knowledgeable about building muscle, nutrition, and making adjustments for injuries. One time, he posted me on his Instagram story when I hit a PR (I don’t use Instagram but it was a sweet gesture). Ultimately, I met my goals and gained a lot more confidence getting back into a routine. I only discontinued because I wanted to take group classes and studio 16 is just personal training.

To be honest, the studio is not perfect. There’s not as much equipment as a regular gym because there is less space. Also, sometimes trainers hold slots even when people cancel, which can be frustrating if you need to move your session. However, I will say the business is REALLY well run. One time, the ceiling started leaking during my workout and by the time the workout ended, Nate had already fixed the leak (this was at 6am in the middle of the winter!). The good news is they’re getting a bigger space in Hell’s Kitchen so hopefully that helps the space and availability problems.

I would definitely work out here in the future. Thank you Nate and Anthony for a fantastic training experience!

originalText.text: Studio 16 is exactly what this neighborhood needs. Studio 16 is not just a studio for personal training, it’s a lifestyle change. We are so happy to have them in our area. From trainers, to food prep, professional staff, clean , safe environment. Nate, the owner takes so much pride in his craft. I’ve been a member for just  a few months and it’s been one of the best decisions I’ve ever done in For my health. Erol.
